name: Bee: The Knight
description:
This is a simple game which you control a flying bee with four buttons.
But the law of inertia won't let you control the bee the way you want to!

‣ Control the bee so it doesn't hit the wall!
‣ Press the button as carefully as possible!
‣ If you're not careful, you'll see a bee that fell in no time!
‣ No matter how much you regret, there is no way back to the past!
‣ Because there is no save and load in this game!
‣ Update the highest point and feel a sense of accomplishment!
‣ If you clear the game, you are the master of the law of inertia!
